data.text:
#NaughtyList featuring @dixiedamelio is OUT NOW! It feels good to share new music with you after so long, especially something fun after the crazy year we’ve all had!
https://t.co/90G5gjbJCL https://t.co/WWLkYCv7Fs
Loved doing this and looking back over the past few years! Thanks for having me @BBCR1 🙌🏼 https://t.co/imnQWZhBXU
I’m excited to be speaking at this year's #WebSummit! I've always had a love for tech and finding new ways to use it to connect to my audience is so exciting. https://t.co/dOWFWuIqkS
Loved seeing you all do the #NaughtyList challenge, don't forget to tag me and @dixiedamelio when you've done it ❄️ https://t.co/hEQXPjYB2I

Have you set your alarm yet? ⏰🎄 The LP Advent Calendar starts tomorrow, it's not too late to get the app with all the money going to @UNICEF and @TrussellTrust 
https://t.co/aqa8m7rjqi

Who wants to wake up to me this December? @romankemp and I have made an alarm clock app to wake you up smiling as we countdown to Christmas! The LP Advent Calendar is available to buy now, all in support of @UNICEF and @TrussellTrust. Starting Dec 1st! https://t.co/aqa8m7rjqi https://t.co/CklTbx41N7
Have you got what it takes for the #NaughtyList challenge? ❄️ Try it out below, tag me and @dixiedamelio when you do it! https://t.co/nXhn2eTG8S https://t.co/lGKv0Yd5VV

Tomorrow at 12pm PT / 8pm GMT join me as we watch back Act 3 of #TheLPShow together! I normally hate watching myself back, but i'm sure we'll all have a laugh here as I spent the night getting scared 🎃😅 Get your tickets now, see you there! https://t.co/VQp69fVx2F https://t.co/uf5wbxCixD

To celebrate #WorldChildrensDay I wanted to share another story from Yemen and how #covid19 has effected young people around the world.

@UNICEF_uk are working around the world to protect children like Muna. To find out more and donate please visit https://t.co/ye2lmR7Obt https://t.co/cjVnesVkMK

I loved working on this capsule with #HUGO, it looks great and at the same time is highlighting the important work that @CmiA_AbTF does. Thanks again to Marina Testino for joining me on this shoot 🙏🏼 https://t.co/zcBy0t0ugE #HUGOxLiamPayne https://t.co/bJiw7LT9p9

Genuinely loved recording this podcast with the lads at @JaacksHappyHour. We really did talk about anything and everything 😅... Have a listen now on @Spotify 

https://t.co/8RbRECjXlt https://t.co/LOMHoe2rtQ

I’m excited to be part of Global’s @makenoise #CelebrityGiftmas, helping those hit hardest by coronavirus across the UK.

For your chance to win a video message from me to you, or for a special someone in your life this Christmas, enter here: https://t.co/E1Zt8mgMGi https://t.co/gn9ADYtIhF

I’m excited to share with you my new capsule collection with HUGO! With this third collection we wanted sustainability to be at the heart of the products, using different materials and styles to make something really special for everyone 🙌🏼 https://t.co/zcBy0t0ugE #HUGOxLiamPayne https://t.co/j4AGsQmoV4

I am so proud to be part of @voicesofyouth with @UNICEF_uk for #WorldChildrensDay and meet the incredibly inspiring 13 year-old, Areej in Yemen. 
 
To find out more about how Unicef is working to support children like Areej visit https://t.co/HG643HwR6Z 

https://t.co/Sjoh6x0fQl

Excited to announce #TheLPShow Act 3 Watch Party at 12pm PT/8pm GMT on Nov 21st!

Like Act 2, I’ll be streaming live, talking to you in the @Veeps comments and answering tweets. Send your Q's now using #TheLPShowAct3! 🙌🏼

Tickets on sale now, see you Sat! https://t.co/SL1hNW4tR9 https://t.co/UXCvhv6FtR
Best of luck for the show, @TomFelton! https://t.co/nzB5DJ731C

Who’s been listening to #NaughtyList? If you haven’t learnt the lyrics yet, check out the lyric video then show @dixiedamelio and I your TikToks! 🙌🏼

https://t.co/4wBZxSKxif https://t.co/w3AKk2XSCW

It was so much fun having @abbyrartistry be a part of #TheLPShow Halloween Special 🙌🏼 I didn't quite realise that she caught some of my very best moments behind the scenes though… 😂 check out the full video: https://t.co/CPI4uWrZ66 https://t.co/i2SpMUGkiF

I see you guys are doing a streaming party tonight for #NaughtyList, mind if I join in? 
#NaughtyListStreamingParty 
https://t.co/RO8p9mmz6o https://t.co/fpNW5Sg5ON
Pop-star @LiamPayne joins forces with @dixiedamelio on the new single "Naughty List" to get us into the Christmas spirit! Listen now: https://t.co/sUUNDnfF39 https://t.co/GFo8FtlgS0

I’m campaigning for a #HungerFreeFuture with the @TrussellTrust. It's an injustice that anyone in this country is unable to afford food, and I know together we can end this.
Please sign up below https://t.co/xmiEcyIq30 https://t.co/4r6KKwFd7u
Who's listening to #NaughtyList? ❄️ https://t.co/RO8p9mmz6o

Hi guys! Thank you all so much for joining #TheLPShowAct3 🎃 Hope you enjoyed it 👻

In case you missed it, the amazing @TomFelton has just announced his show on @veeps, ‘Tom Felton’s Home Party: 19 Years Later’ and tickets are on sale now! https://t.co/IxWPqH7jIy https://t.co/YVRMQdOu4F
Liam’s choice https://t.co/9Ho8zR1h6H
Abby’s choice https://t.co/4E3VzORmow

Choose you favourite look for the #LPCostumeComp
#TheLPShow
Abby’s choice https://t.co/IvwPgfJdC6
